title: Bug on Free Rotation
body:
I'm lv 3,
this week free rotation is Morderkaiser, Ezreal, Jinx, Swain, Shaco, etc....
I know that you get different free rotation before lv 6(JInx, Ashe, Brand, Ryze, Varus, Lux, Kha Zix, Garen, Wukong)

But somehow I didn't get the free rotation and before 6 rotation. But instead, I got: Nami, Morgana, Miss Fortune, Brand, Caitlyn, Gnar, Xin Zhao, Illaoi, Sona and Nocturne for free.

Is this a bug or new pre 6 rotation?

replies.body: Free champion rotation was changed to offer special champion rotations for new accounts before reaching level 11.  You'll see the normal champion rotation after achieving that level per our [champion guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion#h4q1).  I hope that helps clear things up!
I am lv 6 now and still doesnt have my free rotation
